definition: object of ridicule/laughingstock/to laugh over sth/to make light chat
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: The window is bright several only, cup of teas, with your friends at joke world important matter.
sentences.chinese: 窗明几淨，一杯茶，三兩人在笑談天下大事。

sentences.english: This riddle, has become the Internal Classic joke.
sentences.chinese: 此謎語，已成爲警隊內部經典笑談。

sentences.english: He had many an anecdote of the gilded youth of his time.
sentences.chinese: 他有許多他那時代的闊氣少爺們的笑談。

sentences.english: Thou makest us a byword among the heathen, a shaking of the head among the people.
sentences.chinese: 你使我們在列邦中作了笑談，使衆民向我們搖頭。

sentences.english: Chapman joke is the "spy row" opened her "good life.
sentences.chinese: 查普曼笑談是“間諜風波”開啓了她的“美好生活”。

sentences.english: Kate’s failure to get a ring on her finger became a national joke.
sentences.chinese: 凱特手指上連個戒指都沒帶一度在全英成爲笑談。

sentences.english: I know there are those who dismiss such beliefs as happy talk.
sentences.chinese: 我知道，有人會摒棄這些信念，把它們看做笑談。

sentences.english: Hopefully it’s something that the whole family can laugh about in years to come.
sentences.chinese: 希望幾年後這件事只是整個家庭的一個笑談而已。

definition: lit. cool breeze and bright moon (idiom)/fig. peaceful and clear night/(allusively) living a solitary and quiet life
to inspect one by one/to list individually
the ways of the world/social behavior
